agile.name: agile
agile.description: Can be placed in either the Close Combat or the Ranged Combat row. Cannot be moved once placed.

hero.name: hero
hero.description: Not affected by any Special Cards or abilities.

medic.name: medic
medic.description: Choose one card from your discard pile and play it instantly (no Heroes or Special Cards).

morale_boost.name: Morale
morale_boost.description: Adds +1 to all units in the row (excluding itself).

commander_horn.name: Commander's Horn
commander_horn.description: Doubles the strength of all unit cards in that row. Limited to 1 per row.

scorch.name: Scorch
scorch.description: Discard after playing. Kills the strongest card(s) on the battlefield.

decoy.name: Decoy
decoy.description: Swap with a card on the battlefield to return it to your hand.

muster.name: muster
muster.description: Find any cards with the same name in your deck and play them instantly.

spy.name: spy
spy.description: Place on your opponent's battlefield (counts towards your opponent's total) and draw 2 cards from your deck.

tight_bond.name: Tight Bond
tight_bond.description: Place next to a card with the same name to double the strength of both cards.

weather_clear.name: Clear Weather
weather_clear.description: Removes all Weather Cards (Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog and Torrential Rain) effects.

weather_frost.name: Biting Frost
weather_frost.description: Sets the strength of all Close Combat cards to 1 for both players.

weather_fog.name: Impenetrable Fog
weather_fog.description: Sets the strength of all Ranged Combat cards to 1 for both players.

weather_rain.name: Torrential Rain
weather_rain.description: Sets the strength of all Siege Combat cards to 1 for both players.
